entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
